    // valores de fspy
    var position = new Vector3(
        -1.3013652554017365,
        1.2191799727337025,
        -4.261721271971087
    )

    //valores de fspy
    var rotation = new Quaternion(
        -0.005837166756737747,
        -0.9881411214417758,
        -0.12056673218081797,
        0.09490371273707121
    )
